meanings.sent1: She giggled tipsily as she tried to walk in a straight line.

meanings.sent3: The cat swayed tipsily after drinking from the spilled beer.

meanings.definition: Showing signs of being under the influence of alcohol.
meanings.sent1: He stumbled tipsily out of the bar, struggling to keep his balance.
meanings.sent2: The tipsily grinning man slurred his words as he spoke.
meanings.sent3: The tipsily decorated Christmas tree leaned slightly to one side.
meanings.sent4: The tipsily painted sign on the door was crooked and colorful.
meanings.sent5: The tipsily spinning room made her feel dizzy and disoriented.
